sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine and the complete backend API for managing versioned scripts.
epic_coverage: Core Data Transformation Engine, Transformation Script Management & UI
key_deliverables: Functional Jint wrapper service with sandboxing; RESTful API for script CRUD with versioning; Database schema for scripts.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate API calls via Swagger/Postman for creating, updating (versioning), and deleting a script. Show encrypted script content in the database.
success_criteria: All backend integration tests for the Jint engine and CRUD API are passing. Security review of sandboxing is complete.
risk_factors: Complexity of Jint sandbox configuration; Performance of versioning database transactions.
mitigation_strategies: Assign senior backend developers; Conduct early security review; Implement performance benchmarks early.

sprint_goal: Build the user interface for managing scripts and the backend for script previews.
key_deliverables: React UI for script CRUD with Monaco Editor integration; Backend Preview API with timeout and structured error handling.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating and editing a script in the Monaco Editor UI. Show a successful preview with sample data. Show a script error and a timeout error from the Preview API.
success_criteria: The script management UI is functional and connected to the backend. The preview API is fully tested and documented.
risk_factors: Complexity of Monaco Editor integration; Managing async timeouts in the preview API.
mitigation_strategies: Allocate a spike for Monaco integration if needed; Use of CancellationTokens throughout the backend call stack.
external_dependencies: Connector framework must be available for live data preview.
integration_windows: Frontend/Backend integration for script CRUD and preview API contract.

sprint_goal: Complete the interactive developer experience by integrating the preview functionality and adding version history management to the UI.
epic_coverage: Script Development and Preview Experience, Transformation Script Management & UI
key_deliverables: 3-pane resizable preview UI; UI for version history, visual diff, and reverting scripts; Performance warning in report configuration.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate the full preview workflow in the 3-pane UI. Show the version history for a script, compare two versions, and revert to an older version.
success_criteria: The script preview and versioning features are fully functional end-to-end. E2E tests for these workflows are passing.
risk_factors: Performance of the visual diff component with large scripts; Frontend state management complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Evaluate diff libraries for performance early; Use a robust state management pattern.
integration_windows: Integration with backend APIs for preview and versioning.

sprint_goal: Finalize operational requirements, logging, monitoring, and documentation.
epic_coverage: System Operations and Rollout, Security, Compliance, and Isolation
key_deliverables: Prometheus `/metrics` endpoint; Comprehensive security audit trail; Full documentation suite (User Guide, API Reference).
demo_objectives: Show the `/metrics` endpoint in a browser and explain the metrics. Demonstrate audit logs being created after a script is modified and after a sandbox violation.
success_criteria: All operational requirements are met. The feature is fully documented and ready for release.
risk_factors: Audit trail design may not meet compliance standards; Legacy data migration script complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Review audit trail design with compliance experts; Develop migration script with a 'dry run' mode and extensive testing.
